document_data.mainbody:
he Almraiven Peninsula was a rocky peninsula in west Faer√ªns Lands of Intrigue region, named after the mountain chain that was part of it - the Alimir Mountains.
This peninsula was within the borders of both eastern Calimshan and eastern Tethyr. It included the Qartan Hills and eastern expanse of the Darthiir Wood that stretched alongside it. It was framed by the Shining Sea to the south and the Lake of Steam to the north.
* The main thorough fairs of the peninsula were the Pevadaas Trail, Narrows Trail, and Dragon Turtle Trail.
At the height of Shanatars power in -8100 DR, the Underdark depths of the Almraiven Peninsula were within its borders.
